name: Peter Parker's Conciousness
text: Forced Response: After an ally you control leaves play, discard the top 8 cards of your deck. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [mental][mental] resources and read this card's flavor text → remove this card from the game. “The die is cast!”

name: Limitless Power
text: Supernova has been imprisoned by the Superior Spider-Man for months. Now she's back with a vengeance and incredible power. Supernova gets +1 ATK and +1 THW. Supernova cannot be defeated. [acceleration]

name: Supernova
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Supernova activates against you, deal 1 damage to each character you control and place 1 threat on each scheme. (Superior Spider-Man's nemesis minion.) “Spider-Man will pay for what he did to me!”

name: Explosion of Power
text: When Revealed: Take 4 indirect damage. Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an [energy] resource. Add that card to your hand. [star] Boost: Take 1 indirect damage.

name: Dynamo Assault
text: Surge. When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck and each player deck.
